## GAD-7 vs BIS-11

GAD-7 vs BIS-11 Whenever psychologists or social scientists need to make a comparison between the GAD-7 and BIS-11, the process of matching identical or similar items in the two instruments can often be time-consuming and subjective. But with the Harmony software, harmonisation of these two instruments can be achieved smoothly and efficiently. GAD-7 vs BIS-11 comparison becomes significantly easier by automating the process with powerful AI and natural language processing algorithms. Harmony lends its strength from large language models to compare instruments, providing a percentage match between each item in GAD-7 and BIS-11. If you have the need to compare GAD-7 and BIS-11, Harmony provides a quick and easy platform for you to accomplish this. Their interface is user-friendly, allowing you to select from a database or simply drag and drop your own PDF instruments directly into their application at https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app. The unique selling proposition of Harmony is that it's capable of comparing items even in different languages. GAD-7 vs BIS-11 comparison could be vitally important in your research process and Harmony has made sure that language is no barrier. The tool presents a phenomenal opportunity for researchers to conduct longitudinal and cohort studies and test the consistency of results across diverse studies. You are invited to harness the power of Harmony in your GAD-7 vs BIS-11 comparative analysis.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and BIS-11

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and BIS-11 into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just BIS-11 into Harmony</a> - compare BIS-11 with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
